thread.title: Priyanka Chopra remembers dad on parents' wedding anniversary
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra remembers dad on parents' wedding anniversary | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Priyanka Chopra remembers dad on parents' wedding anniversary
text:
Actress Priyanka Chopra has got nostalgic as she shared a memory from her parents wedding day to wish them on their anniversary.
Pic: Priyanka Chopra looks flawless at a fashion extravaganza in New York All that glittered was gold for international superstar Priyanka Chopra, as she stepped out in style for the Marc Jacobs show at the ongoing New York Fashion Week.
The 34-year-old actress' father, Dr Ashok Chopra had died of prolonged battle with cancer in June 2010. He was 62.
Priyanka was very close to her father and even has a tattoo 'Daddy's lil girl' inked on her wrist.
Taking to Instagram, the 'Quantico' actress wish 'Happy anniversary' to her parents and said that nothing in this world can fill the space left by her father.
"Happy anniversary Ma and Dad. Nothing will fill his void @chopramm2001 but here's to wonderful memories that we'll never forget. I love you mom," she wrote alongside the picture of her parents.
Happy anniversary Ma and Dad. Nothing will fill his void @chopramm2001 but here's to wonderful memories that we'll never forget. I love u mom!
A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 18, 2017 at 8:53am PST
On the work front, Priyanka is currently awaiting the release of her Hollywood debut 'Baywatch', which also stars Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron.
No short cut to success in Hollywood, says Priyanka 00:35

Sunny can’t resist doing and apparently leaves the sets every 15 minutes during the shooting to go and clean her feet. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Hollywood actress Megan Fox has this weird habit of not flushing after using a washroom. In an interview to a magazine, the actress revealed that she doesn’t believe in cleanliness. She forgets to flush after using washroom and said that her friends often complain about this bad habit of hers. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Bollywood actress Kareena Kapoor Khan, who made headlines by walking the ramp for Lakme Fashion Week post pregnancy, apparently cannot keep herself from biting her nails. But she has stopped doing that after she realized that drinking pee doesn’t get anyone into kick-ass shape. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Bollywood actress Ameesha Patel is totally obsessed with pink colour. Even her wardrobe flaunts her favourite colour and she is often spotted wearing it. This habit of Jessica really bothers her colleagues. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Bollywood’s King of Romance Shah Rukh Khan has an obsession for footwear. He had said in an interview that he takes off his shoes only once in a day and sometimes he sleeps with his shoes only. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Quantico star Priyanka Chopra prefers her things organized. She even gets upset if things are not in their place. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! She checks a bathroom’s cleanliness before she books a hotel. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Hollywood actor Robert Pattinson feels that he doesn’t really need to wash his hair. He doesn’t wash them for weeks. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! The Sex Tape star Cameron Diaz has cleanliness OCD as she opens doors with her elbows. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Bollywood actress Vidya Balan does not like keeping mobile phones. She forgets to check her phone for days. Bollywood actor Kunal Kapoor has a habit of leaving a bit of food on his plate after every meal. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you! Hollywood actor Tom Cruise uses nightingale droppings as part of his facial concoction to keep his skin from ageing. Weird habits of celebrities that will shock you!
